Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Authorizes the village of Mayville to transfer the funds of the the Mayville ambulance reserve fund and the Mayville fire and rescue equipment reserve fund to the North Lake Fire District reserve accounts
Summary: Authorizes the village of Mayville to transfer the funds of the the Mayville ambulance reserve fund and the Mayville fire and rescue equipment reserve fund to the newly formed North Lake Fire District reserve accounts.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to permitting the village of Mayville board of trustees to transfer the funds of the Mayville ambulance reserve fund and the Mayville fire and rescue equipment reserve fund to the newly formed North Lake Fire District reserve accounts
